text: Neil Mitchell (born 8 June 1965) is a Scottish musician, best known as the keyboard player for Wet Wet Wet. Mitchell was born in Helensburgh, Dunbartonshire. In June 2010, Mitchell was ordered to take part in a domestic violence programme after he admitted assaulting his girlfriend, Olivia Warren, in July 2009."Wet Wet Wet star sentenced for punching his girlfriend" - BBC News ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Wet Wet Wet members Category:Scottish keyboardists Category:People from Helensburgh Category:People educated at Clydebank High School
title: Neil Mitchell (musician)
